actions.committee: House Committee on Ways and Means
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Ways and Means.

actions.in_committee: House Committee on Ways and Means

official_title: A bill to amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1954 to increase the limitation of the interest deduction for interest paid or accrued on investment indebtedness from $10,000 to $25,000 for individuals with earned income.

summary.text: Interest Deduction Equity Act of 1981 - Amends the Internal Revenue Code to increase to $25,000 the limitation on the income tax deduction for interest paid or accrued on investment indebtedness for individuals with earned income.

titles.title: A bill to amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1954 to increase the limitation of the interest deduction for interest paid or accrued on investment indebtedness from $10,000 to $25,000 for individuals with earned income.
